column1: What did the start of your investing journey look like?

column2: Wish stocks were easier to understand, specifically the taxes related to them.

column1: What is adivce you woul give to a new investor?
column2: Invest early. Set aside an amount to invest right away when starting your first career. It will never really be seen as a "loss" from the paycheck/bank account and will be very beneficial in the future.

column1: What would you want from a generic AI chatbot? (not just financial)
column2: To be sufficient. They are quicker than waiting on hold for a representative/support.

column1: What about a finance AI chatbot specifically?
column2: n/a

column1: What are some concerns you have with AI?
column2: AI taking over jobs and ruining society - people becoming lazy and social skill depleting over less physical work. Spam calls with the voice analyzation and reforming is scary as well.

column1: What questions might you ask the OpenFinAL bot?
column2: Show me current rates for CDs.
